description.en:
Hell is crowded and the hall is closed. The king of the underworld, Chen Yan Luo, died and became a high school student! “I wanted to be a normal person, flirting with the school girl and going to my father-in-law’s house for dinner, but there are always rivals who come uninvited, so fuck it, I’m going to show my cards! Oh shit, here we again!”

description.en:
When Nagyunn’s twin brother, Najin, is murdered before his very eyes, he vows to avenge his brother’s death by assuming Najin’s identity. 

But although the two may look alike, when it comes to fighting, Nagyunn lacks the talent and skill his brother possessed. In order to successfully execute his plot for revenge, Nagyunn resolves to train himself to become the prodigious knight-in-training his brother once was. 

Will Nagyunn be able to keep his identity a secret before others begin to catch on to his act?

软弱的我为复仇假扮弟弟！
某天，洛辰洛谦两兄弟家里来了一伙神秘人，他们企图杀害弟弟洛辰。洛辰是整个大陆最有实力的预备骑士，而洛谦却是一个手无缚鸡之力的少年。危机时刻洛辰为了保护哥哥丧命于家中。哥哥洛谦为了查明真相，找出真凶，于是假扮成弟弟成为了一名骑士。但哥哥洛谦并没有骑士资质，他只能依靠伪装骗过众人，同时寻找神秘人为弟弟报仇。软弱的洛谦可以成功找到真相为弟弟复仇吗？

description.en: Lu Nanzhi reincarnated into a stand-in romance novel as vicious female rival, and her task is to make the heroine Chen Xi achive happiness. The industry beauty thought that attacking the heroine was also a way to ‘make the heroine happy’, so she took the initiative to pursue the heroine. But she gradually felt that the attitude towards herself from the surrounding characters seemed to be different from that in the book?

altTitles.ja: 愛されたがりの白猫ミコさん

altTitles.en: Miko, a White Cat That Wants to Be Loved

description.en: Miko is a white cat who used to be a stray but has since become the most pampered cat in the world! she doesn't care if her owner is working or on a call -- she demands affection at all times.
description.ja:
元野良猫のミコさんは、超がつくほど甘えんぼ。
飼い主が仕事中でも電話中でもいついかなるときも愛されたくて仕方がない…。
そんなミコさんとの愛し愛される相思相愛コミックエッセイ!

altTitles.ja: Desutoro 246

description.en: Billionaire Tono Ryuichi, the President of Tono Foods Group, a giant food company, recently acquired two young female assassins from the Mexican cartel. Sui and Ai came from unimaginably poor childhoods and was given a choice between killing people or selling their body. They chose the former and went through an inconceivably extreme training and, at 17 years old, they have become one of the deadliest assassins in the world. They are absolutely obedient to their master and they are given the task of finding the killer that poisoned Ryuichi's wife and child. They begin attending high school to blend into society and, at the same time, read and study which helps them become even more deadlier on the field. Sui and Ai encounter Matoba Imari who is a high school assassin herself and may be more skilled than both of them. But unlike the two, Imari just wants to lead a normal life. Whatever Imari wishes for her life is not their problem because the only thing Sui and Ai feeds on are bloodthirst and a challenge.
description.ja: 青年実業家の透野隆一は南米のマフィアから2人の美少女殺し屋を買い付ける。翠と藍と名付けられた彼女たちは透野の命令で、彼の妻子を殺した人間を狩ることに。だがその道行きで別の殺し屋女子たちと出会い、事態は思わぬ方向へ加速していくのだった…。青年実業家の透野隆一は南米のマフィアから2人の美少女殺し屋を買い付ける。翠と藍と名付けられた彼女たちは透野の命令で、彼の妻子を殺した人間を狩ることに。だがその道行きで別の殺し屋女子たちと出会い、事態は思わぬ方向へ加速していくのだった…。
description.vi: Tono Ryuichi, người đứng đầu Tono Foods Group, sở hữu trong tay một chuỗi các nhà hàng hạng sang đắt tiền tại Nhật Bản. Một ngày nọ, anh quyết định đến Mexico mua cho mình hai cô gái sát thủ trẻ được nuôi dưỡng bởi Mafia, với mục đích tìm cho ra kẻ đã hãm hại vợ và con của mình. Anh đặt tên cho cả hai là Sui (THÚY) và Ai (LAM). Sau khi chuyển đến Tokyo, Sui và Ai được Tono cho theo học tại một trường tư thục, nơi cả hai được thỏa thích đọc sách để nâng cao kiến thức để trau dồi thêm kỹ năng ám sát của mình. Tại đây, họ gặp được Matoba Imari, vốn cũng là sát thủ, thậm chí có phần còn giỏi hơn cả hai. Nhưng không giống họ, Imari chỉ muốn có một cuộc sống bình thường. Dẫu vậy, bất chấp mong muốn của Imari, những gì Sui và Ai quan tâm lại chỉ có mùi tanh của máu và những vụ săn giết thỏa mãn được bản tính ưa thách thức của họ.

title.en: Tensei Idol to Doruota no Kishi

altTitles.ja: 転生アイドルとドルオタの騎士
転生アイドルとドルオタの騎士 ‐恋人編‐

altTitles.en: Reincarnation Idol & Idol Freak Knight - Lover’s Episode

description.en:
After going through several lifetimes, Takao, a former knight, is currently living as an office worker in modern Japan. After discovering Hikaru, who is the reincarnation of the prince he served and was unable to protect until the end in their past lives, he swore to protect Hikaru in this life by being a hardcore fan.
For the sake of protecting Hikaru from a closer position, Takao decided to become his manager. But after Hikaru, who has an aloof personality this time compared to their past lives, showed him a smile directed only to him, Takao starts to feel another type of feeling budding within him!

altTitles.en: Let's Have a Toast With Miso Soup!

altTitles.ja: 味噌汁でカンパイ！

description.en:
Zenichirou is a middle school student raised in a motherless family. His breakfast always consists of onigiri and instant miso soup from the convenience store. Yae, a childhood friend of Zenichirou, cannot stand to see him eat such an innutritious breakfast, so she decides to make him breakfast every morning…  
  
This story conveys a simple message: eating with another person makes miso soup taste more delicious and hearty!

altTitles.ja: 転生前はドラゴンでした

altTitles.en: Before Reincarnation I Was A Dragon

description.en: The hero and the dragon defeated the Demon King, saving the world, but they died. Then they were reincarnated in another world (Japan)... This is their story.

altTitles.ja: お憑かれさま、黒瀬くん

altTitles.vi: Kurose bị (ma) ám

description.en:
I feel like I forgot about someone important...

Plagued by nightmares of his old hometown, Yuuma Kurose, a lonely boy with the ability to see ghosts, feels inexplicably drawn back to the place from his dreams. There, he stumbles upon Kaito Kiriyama, a boy shrouded by terrifying spirits. With a serious look in his eyes, Kaito vows he'll protect Yuuma. But the moment their skin makes contact, the spirits surrounding Kaito started to possess Yuuma!

altTitles.fr: 15 minutes avant qu'ils ne sortent ensemble

altTitles.es: 15 minutos hasta que empiecen a salir en serio

altTitles.ru: За 15 минут до того как они начали встречаться

altTitles.ja: マジで付き合う15分前

altTitles.pt-br: 15 minutos até eles começarem a namorar

altTitles.en: Fifteen Minutes Before We Really Date
15 Minutes Before We Seriously Go Out

description.en: Growing up in the same apartment complex, Yuuki and Natsuha have known each other forever. They’ve been friends for so long that everyone just assumes they’re a couple! But as they both approach the final stretch of high school, they get a silly, totally-not-serious idea— what if they actually started dating? What a ridiculous thing to say! Unless…?
description.es: Una adorable historia de dos amigos de la infancia que comienzan a salir. Estando en el tercer año, ni un solo momento se debe perder, pues tienen poco tiempo disponible hasta la universidad. Comenzando con un "Creo que deberíamos romper…"
description.fr:
Une adorable histoire de deux amis d'enfance qui commencent à se fréquenter.  
En terminale, aucun moment ne peut être perdu, car ils ont peu de temps restant avant l'université.  
Tout commence par "Yuuki, séparons nous.".
description.pt-br: Uma adorável história de dois amigos de infância que começaram a namorar. Como alunos do terceiro ano, nenhum minuto pode ser disperdiçado, pois eles não tem muito tempo restante até que a faculdade comece. Tudo começou com um "Eu acho que deveríamos terminar."

altTitles.ja: 未確認で進行形

description.en: This is a four-panel comedy manga about Kobeni Yonomori, who on her 16th birthday suddenly has a young man with little presence named Hakuya Mitsumine and his little sister Mashiro appear in front of her. It turns out that Hakuya is her fiancé, and Mashiro is her future sister-in-law. The three (and Kobeni's overprotective big sister Benio) start living together under the same roof, and hilarious happenings occur.
description.it: Kobeni Yonomori è una studentessa liceale che una volta diventata sedicenne, scopre di essere già fidanzata con un ragazzo di nome Hakuya Mitsumine per via di un accordo fatto dal suo nonno defunto. Costui da questo momento in poi si stabilirà a casa sua insieme alla sorellina Mashiro, e Kobeni, seppur riluttante, dovrà dunque cercare di adattarsi alla sua nuova vita familiare, finora ristretta solo a sua madre Akane e a sua sorella Benio. Ben presto, però, la ragazza si renderà conto che Hakuya e Mashiro sono ben più di ciò che sembrano.
description.ko: 요노모리 코베니는 이혼한 후 일 때문에 바쁜 어머니 요노모리 아카네를 대신하여 집안일을 담당하면서 언니 요노모리 베니오와 함께 3명이서 평범하게 생활하고 있었지만, 16세 생일을 맞이하던 날, 약혼자라고 주장하는 소년 미츠미네 하쿠야와 그의 여동생 미츠미네 마시로와 만나, 집에서 함께 생활하게 된다.
description.ru: Кобэни Ёномори, симпатичная девушка и отличная хозяйка, получила на 16-й день рождения самый необычный подарок. Мать объявила, что по слову покойного деда, главы клана, Кобэни с детства помолвлена с наследником семьи Мицуминэ, своим ровесником по имени Хакуя. Сам суженый знатного рода, но вырос в горной деревне, и, чтобы обрести городской шик и приобщиться к цивилизации, отныне будет жить с ними – а вот, кстати, и он. Окончательно добило Ёномори-младшую явление вихря энергии в виде малышки Масиро Мицуминэ, которая с порога заявила, что не отдаст братика абы кому и быстро научит невестку жить по закону гор! Впрочем, все вышло не так уж плохо. Малолетняя «золовка», поняв, что брату досталась вовсе не белоручка, быстро подобрела, а Бэнио, старшая из сестер Ёномори, ненавязчиво показала гостье, кто в доме хозяйка, да так, что бедная Масиро стала прятаться от будущей «сватьи». Ну а Хакуя оказался, словно самурай иной эпохи – загадочный, невозмутимый, не тратящий слов зря, но говорящий только по делу. Из обрывков фраз и прочих намеков Кобэни поняла, что помолвка возникла не на пустом месте, и их с Хакуей связывает давняя история. А раз так, незачем спешить - надо разобраться в себе и дать парню шанс. Не зря говорят – браки по расчету всегда удачны, если расчет был хороший!
description.vi: Đại khái phần manga của anime cùng tên, thánh nào chưa coi thì xin mời nhé. Cơ bản là em hàng Kobeni Yonomori đến 16 tuổi thì tự nhiên boy lạnh lùng Hakuya Mitsumine cùng em gái Mashiro xuất hiện. Rồi té ra boy đó là hôn thê, còn con em là em rể.
description.es-la: Kobeni Yonomori es una chica de secundaria que vive con su madre y su hermana mayor Benio. Al cumplir los 16 años Kobeni se sorprende al enterarse de que debido a un acuerdo hecho por su difunto abuelo ella está comprometida con un chico llamado Hakuya Mitsumine quien, junto con su hermana pequeña Mashiro, van a vivir con ella. A medida que Kobeni se va adaptando a esta nueva familia, descubre de que Hakuya y Mashiro son más de lo que aparentaban.
description.pt-br: Este é um mangá de comédia de quatro painéis sobre Kobeni Yonomori, que em seu aniversário de 16 anos, de repente, tem um jovem com pouca presença chamado Hakuya Mitsumine e sua irmãzinha Mashiro aparecem na frente dela. Acontece que Hakuya é seu noivo, e Mashiro é sua futura cunhada. Os três (e a irmã mais velha de Kobeni, Benio) começam a viver juntos sob o mesmo teto, e acontecem acontecimentos hilários.
description.zh-hk: 過著普通生活的高中女生——夜之森小紅，在迎接16歲生日時，從媽媽口中得知了一件驚人的禮物。與小紅有著婚約的少年——三峰白夜與其妹妹三峰真白將要一起住在同個屋簷下，三人與小紅的姊姊——夜之森紅緒之間的奇妙同居生活就此揭開序幕。

altTitles.ja: 今日から始める幼なじみ

altTitles.zh-hk: 從今天開始的青梅竹馬

altTitles.zh: 从今天开始的青梅竹马

altTitles.ja: 今日おさ

altTitles.vi: Bạn từ nhỏ kể từ ngày hôm nay

description.en:
Kaede Yuzuki is Kouhei Aida's new neighbor, both at home and in the classroom. Kouhei tries to be friendly with Kaede, but their conversations lead nowhere. But then one day…
___
[Official X Account](https://twitter.com/kyo_osa0420)
description.es-la: Kaede Yuzuki siempre deseó tener un amigo de la infancia como en los mangas que lee. Cuando se mudó al lado de su compañero de clase, Kouhei Aida, él dijo que haría cualquier cosa para ayudarla. Entonces, ¡ella le pidió que fuera su amigo de la infancia! ¡Los dos tienen divertidas aventuras recreando todas las cosas que deberían hacer los amigos de la infancia!

altTitles.ja: スロウスタート

description.en: Following an unfortunately timed case of the mumps, Hana Ichinose misses all of her high school entrance exams and ends up having to spend a gap year as a ronin. Moving to a new location and starting high school a year late, Hana becomes friends with her classmates, Eiko, Tama, and Kamuri, while keeping it a secret that she is a year older than them.

altTitles.ja: 悪役令嬢の中の人
悪役令嬢の中の人〜断罪された転生者のため嘘つきヒロインに復讐いたします〜

Ác Nữ chuyển sinh

description.en:
In order to clear the name of ‘Emi’, a girl who had reincarnated as Remilia, the villainess of an otome game, the real Remilia who had been watching all along inside awakens.

Now it's time for the true villainess's revenge to begin!
description.id:
Agar bisa membersihkan nama "Emi", yaitu nama seorang gadis yang bereinkarnasi menjadi Remilia sang villainess dari sebuah game otome, Remilia asli yang selama ini mengawasi emi dari dalam akhirnya telah tersadar.

Sekarang adalah waktunya bagi sang villainess yang asli untuk membalaskan dendamnya!
description.vi: Để minh oan cho ‘Emi’, một cô gái đã tái sinh thành Remilia, nhân vật phản diện của trò chơi otome, Remilia, người đã luôn theo dõi cô, bắt đầu trả thù!

altTitles.ja: メイドの岸さん

description.en: Kiichiro Hayase has a reputation as the wealthiest, hottest, most eligible bachelor in town. But as they say...behind every successful man is the maid who keeps him from tripping over his own two feet! Enter Miss Kishi, the most competent, professional maid around—and the only thing keeping from Kiichiro quite literally crashing and burning. He owes it all to her, but can he ever make it up to her? He's sworn to try... no matter how many things must get broken, scattered, or lost to do so!
description.pt: Uma comédia romântica sobre um mestre desajeitado que quer fazer sua calma empregada feliz. Hayase Kiichirou vem de uma importante família. Como próximo sucessor, todas as empresas da família serão dele. Ele é a elite da elite. Contudo, sua única fraqueza é o fato de ser desajeitado, assim, Kishi-san, sua empregada, é aquela que sempre da um jeito nas coisas pra ele. Apesar de ter sempre a mesma expressão, Kiichirou está determinado a fazê-la feliz, independente da situação.
description.vi: Kiichiro Hayase là một đại gia giàu nứt đổ đổ vách, cùng với vẻ ngoài điển trai, nói không ngoa thì anh chính là nam thần hàng đầu Nhật Bản. Tuy nhiên như bao người đàn ông ở ngoài kia, Kiichiro của chúng ta cũng có vô số thiếu sót, khiến anh phải dựa vào cô hầu gái riêng của mình là Kishi để giữ vững hình tượng "hoàn hảo" kia.

title.en: S-Rank Party Kara Kaikosareta [Jugushi] ~"Noroi no Item" Shika Tsukuremasen ga, Sono Seinou wa Artifact-kyuu nari......!~

altTitles.ja: Ｓランクパーティから解雇された【呪具師】～『呪いのアイテム』しか作れませんが、その性能はアーティファクト級なり……！～

altTitles.en: I'm a Curse Crafter, and I Don't Need an S-Rank Party!
My S-Rank Party Fired Me for Being a Cursificer: I Can Only Make “Cursed Items”, but They're Artifact Class!

altTitles.vi: Chỉ biết chế tạo trang bị nguyền rủa, tôi bị đuổi khỏi tổ đội cấp S

description.en:
Gaile, a Cursificer, is left penniless when he's expelled from his party as soon as they reach S Rank. Apparently he wasn't contributing enough?! But they hadn't realized that his cursed items outperform even holy relics and legendary equipment!

Gaile decides to try to make a living on his own off of his cursed items.
description.ja:
【呪具師】のゲイルは大して貢献していないと、パーティがＳランクに昇格したと同時に無一文で追い出される。しかし、彼らは理解していなかった。ゲイルの作る呪具は、そこらの聖遺物や勇者の装備をも凌駕する性能を誇っていたことに…。ゲイルは呪具を活かして一人で生きていこうと決意しーー。

風変わりな職業・呪具師の大活躍が新感覚の爽快感で大反響!!
description.vi: Gaile, một nguyền cụ sư tài năng, đã bị các đồng đội phản bội khi tổ đội đạt được hạng S. Họ không ngờ ràng các nguyền cụ của anh ta còn mạnh hơn cả thánh tích và các trang bị thần thoại. Sau khi bị đuổi khỏi tổ đội, Gaile quyết định tự mình kiếm sống bằng những nguyền cụ do mình tạo ra. Chuyến phiêu lưu của anh chàng nguyền cụ sư chính thức bắt đầu.
description.pt-br:
A versão mangá de um dos romances de fantasia isekai mais populares de Shousetsuka ni Narou!

Gaile, um Cursificer, fica sem um tostão quando é expulso de seu grupo assim que chegam ao Rank S. Aparentemente ele não estava contribuindo o suficiente?! Mas eles não tinham percebido que seus itens amaldiçoados superam até mesmo relíquias sagradas e equipamentos lendários!

Gaile decide tentar ganhar a vida por conta própria com seus itens amaldiçoados.

altTitles.ja: JESUS 砂塵航路

description.en:
Continuation of the manga "Jesus". The legendary killer, hiding under the guise of school teacher Fujisawa Shingo, returns to Japan after more than ten years! What made him come back? What has he been doing for these ten years? Is one of his new students connected to 24?
Read on and find out in JESUS: Path of the Sandstorm!

title.en: Akuma wa Rozario ni Kiss o suru

altTitles.ja: 悪魔はロザリオにキスをする

altTitles.vi: Lên Chuỗi Tràng Hạt, Ác Ma đặt Nụ Hôn
𨑗𠁻長曷，惡魔噠𦵚㖧 (Nom Script)

description.en:
Since his childhood, Yoshihiro Yoshinaga has faced countless challenges, distancing himself from the company of others and the possibility of forging friendships due to a persistent problem: being harassed by spirits from an early age.

This constant spectral presence has cast shadows over his life, weaving a web of misfortunes. However, the course of his life takes a drastic turn when a giant demon unexpectedly emerges intent on taking his life. In the midst of this crisis, a chance encounter with Alicia Baal, a beautiful nun residing within a church, becomes the catalyst for a radical transformation to his destiny.
description.ja: 幸彦は幽霊が見えたが、その実態は悪魔だった。ある日、本物の悪魔に遭遇。逃げた先の教会でシスター・アリシアと出会い、悪魔退治の契約を交わす。しかし彼女の正体は、魔王になることを企む「悪魔」だった――！

altTitles.ja: Fate/Grand Order 「聖杯戦線」

description.en: Manga adaptation of the Fate/Grand Order 2020 event: Dance Tournament in the Land of Shadows ~Holy Grail War Between the Bunny and the Cat~.
description.fr: Adaptation manga de l'événement de Fate/Grand Order organisé en 2020 : Dance Tournament in the Land of Shadows ~Holy Grail War Between the Bunny and the Cat~.

altTitles.vi: Có Linh Thú
Hữu Thú Yên

description.en:
"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。
description.es-la:
"En este reino, criaturas mitológicas deambulan, descendientes de los nueve cielos que llaman hogar."
Sibuxiang, un hombre-ciervo mitológico y perezoso, es expulsado del cielo y asignado a apoyar a las criaturas mitológicas que vagan por el mundo humano. Conoce y vive aventuras con sus amigos: el enérgico Pixiu amante de la comida llamado Pipi, el fanático conejo lunar Tony, los hermanos ratones Jinjiao y Yinjiao, también desterrados del cielo, y muchos otros. ¿Qué tipo de aventuras emprenderán?

title.en: Fate/Grand Order Gouka Kenran Mugetsu Sakuhinshuu

altTitles.ja: Fate/Grand Order 豪華剣爛 霧月作品集

description.en: The collection of FGO works by Mugetsu: featuring three prior works alongside two newly created manga pieces. Additionally, the volume encompasses a significant array of previously published FGO illustrations.

title.en: Koi ni Koi suru Koibito Kankei

altTitles.ja: 恋に恋するコイビト関係

altTitles.en: Becoming Her Lover For the Sake of Love

description.en:
Asako Ichijou, the student council president at a prestigious girls' high school, has been racking her brain about the ladykiller Nagi Tenma. That's the sort of person Asako is, but Nagi discovers Asako has broken school rules by bringing a shoujo manga to school...

Asako pleads with Nagi to keep it a secret, and Nagi reveals her condition: "Become my lover."

(Source: Takeshobo, translated)

altTitles.ja: 白蛇のはなむこ

description.en:
A white snake who is a divine messenger and a childhood friend with a mystery. Entangled obsessions in a Japanese-style fantasy.
Tsubaki, a high school student with a predisposition for bad luck, has a one-sided love for his childhood friend Sakuya, who is both beautiful and talented. Then, one day while leaving school they are randomly attacked on the street.

In the ancient capital Kyoto, a lovestory defying fate unfolds.
description.ja: 「遂に手に入れた――。女の、子宮……」 不運体質の高校生・椿。毎日、神社に祀られている傷だらけの狛へび像を拭いて磨くなど心優しい彼は、美人で文武両道、一学年上の幼馴染・咲陽に片思いしていた。そしてある日の下校中、二人は通り魔に襲われてしまい――!? 幸運の白蛇と大禍憑きの少年、そして謎を抱えた幼馴染。それぞれの執着が絡みつき、廻りだす――。古都京都。成り変わり偏愛譚、開幕。『あさこ』『いなり、こんこん、恋いろは。

altTitles.ja: 悪党たちに育てられてます！

altTitles.pt-br: Eu estou sendo criada por vilões

description.en:
I thought I was an illegitimate child… but it turns out that I was a complete stranger?!

A year after transmigrating as an extra, I found out that I was on the verge of being kicked out.

I said I’d rather leave the house on my own.

“Actually, this child is my daughter. Right, daughter?”

Did I catch the attention of the psychopathic duke?

‘I heard that the money he gave after playing with someone was enough to buy an island?’

I got along with him as his daughter because I thought I could get his fortune later on. And a few months later, I would leave his house with a thick bank account.

“Stay by my side until I tell you to leave.”

However, my dad, who regarded me as a toy, came looking for me and held me back.

=

After returning home due to dad’s persuasion, the families and my dad fought to adopt me. My uncles and aunts gathered to protect me, and future psychos began to have strange obsessions over me.

“Happy Birthday, Ayrin. You’re the head as of today.”

On top of that, the duke’s position was my birthday present.
Everything is going just as I expected.

[Hey, how long are you going to sleep? Grandma said she is gonna take you off life support!]
[Cha Miso, you’re going to die!]

What is that voice?
Will I be okay like this? (Synopsis: Gourmet Scans)
description.tr: Gayrimeşru bir çocuk olduğumu sanıyordum… ama tamamen yabancı olduğum ortaya çıktı?! Yan karakter olarak beden değiştirdikten bir yıl sonra kovulmanın eşiğinde olduğumu öğrendim. Evden tek başıma çıkmayı tercih ederim dedim. “Aslında bu çocuk benim kızım. Değil mi kızım?” Psikopat dükün dikkatini mi çektim ? "Biriyle oynadıktan sonra verdiği paranın bir ada almaya yettiğini duydum?" Onunla kızı olarak iyi anlaştım çünkü daha sonra servetini ele geçirebileceğimi düşündüm ve birkaç ay sonra onun evinden kalın bir banka hesabıyla ayrılmayı planladım. "Sana gitmeni söyleyene kadar yanımda kal." Ancak beni oyuncak gibi gören babam beni aramaya geldi ve beni tuttu. *** Babamın iknasıyla eve döndükten sonra aileler ve babam beni evlat edinmek için mücadele etti. Amcalarım ve teyzelerim beni korumak için toplandılar ve geleceğin psikopatları bana karşı garip saplantılar beslemeye başladılar. "Doğum günün kutlu olsun Ayrin. Bugün itibariyle başkan sensin.” Üstelik Dük'ün konumu benim doğum günü hediyemdi. Her şey beklediğim gibi gidiyor. [Hey, daha ne kadar uyuyacaksın? Büyükanne sana tutucunu çıkarmanı söyledi!] [Cha Miso, öleceksin!] Bu ses nedir? Böyle iyi olacak mıyım?
description.pt-br: Negligenciada por sua família, Cha Miso sonha em viver em seu romance favorito como a amada personagem principal. Então, um dia, ela acorda dentro do romance, mas como Eiryn Etam, uma personagem secundária oprimida que será expulsa de sua casa! Para evitar mais negligência, ela planeja ir embora antes que isso aconteça. Mas quando Erno Etam, o herdeiro maluco da Casa Etam, afirma que Eiryn é sua filha, seus planos são frustrados e Eiryn se vê no meio de um conflito entre a Casa Etam e um elenco de vilões.

title.en: Tengoku de Akuma ga Boku wo Miwaku Suru

altTitles.ja: 天獄で悪魔がボクを魅惑する

altTitles.en: The Devil Fascinates Me In Heavenly Prison

description.en:
Set on a solitary island in the distant sea, a dangerous school life begins!

Kaoru Jahana, a boy who aspires to become a true man, begins his high school life on a solitary island in the sea. There, he meets a charming girl, Kanra, who is actually a demon who feeds on men's spirits...and it turns out that all the women on this island are the same demons!?

altTitles.ja: Fate/Samurai Remnant　序

description.en: Note: This oneshot is an adaptation of the game "Fate/Samurai Remnant"
description.fr: Manga one-shot adaptant le début du jeu Fate/Samurai Remnant.
description.uk: Манґа-спешл, передогляд нової історії з серії "Fate", гри в стилі рольовий бойовик (Action RPG).

description.en: One-shot featuring Scathach.

altTitles.ja: ぼくらの夏が裂けていく

description.en: A teenage boy returns to his remote home island from the mainland. While people stopped wearing masks there, on the island the rules to wear masks outside at all times are still surprisingly strict. Could the reason be something different than corona?

altTitles.ja: 嫌いでいさせて

altTitles.en: Hate Me, but Let Me Stay

altTitles.de: Kiraide Isasete - Lass mich dich hassen

altTitles.ko: Let Me Be Here With Hate

altTitles.th: ให้ฉันได้เกลียดนายเถอะนะ

altTitles.vi: Tôi ghét cậu, hãy để tôi yên!

description.de:
Naoto Koga ist ein Omega und ein junger, alleinerziehender Vater, der alles für seine kleine Tochter Shizuku tut. Er liebt sie aus ganzem Herzen, obwohl Shizuku auf dramatische Weise Teil seines Lebens wurde: An der Highschool wurde Naoto vergewaltigt und schwanger. Aufgrund dieses traumatischen Ereignisses hasst Naoto Alphas und lehnt die Idee eines Schicksalspartners beziehungsweise einer Paarbindung ab. In einer Partnervermittlungsbörse, zu deren Teilnahme er sich zwingt, wird er urplötzlich von einem jungen Alpha mit Liebesbekundungen überhäuft. Und dann stellt sich auch noch heraus,, dass Hazuki, der besagte Alpha, ausgerechnet an der Schule eingeschrieben ist, an der Naoto seinen neuen Job begonnen hat. Naoto versucht alles, um seinen Verehrer loszuwerden.

---
[Official Korean Translation (한국어)](https://www.bomtoon.com/comic/ep_list/let_hate)
description.en:
Koga Naoto is an Omega who was raped by his Alpha classmates and got pregnant. Due to that traumatic experience, he came to hate alphas and told himself that he doesn't need a lifemate or a bond – but even with that incident, he insisted on keeping the child and raised her, and an angel named Shizuku was born. She became his strength and center in this cruel world that treats omegas unfairly. However, his life suddenly changed when he met an alpha named Tsuchiya Hazuki from the matchmaking party he forced himself to attend.

---
[Official Korean Translation (한국어)](https://www.bomtoon.com/comic/ep_list/let_hate)
description.fr:
Après avoir subi un viol au lycée, l’oméga Naoto a décidé de garder l’enfant conçu lors de ce terrible incident. Quelques années plus tard, il élève seul sa fille et peine à trouver du travail. N'étant pas marqué par un alpha, son statut de célibataire aux chaleurs incontrôlées entraîne le rejet systématique des recruteurs voulant s'éviter des problèmes. Alors qu’il décroche enfin un emploi dans un lycée, un jeune alpha l'attrape par le bras et lui déclare son amour. Naoto ne peut se défaire de sa méfiance et de sa haine envers les alphas, pas après ce qu'il a vécu. Pourtant, celui-ci a quelque chose de différent…

---
[Official Korean Translation (한국어)](https://www.bomtoon.com/comic/ep_list/let_hate)
description.id:
Naoto Koga adalah seorang Omega yang diperkosa oleh teman sekelas Alpha-nya dan hamil. Karena pengalaman traumatis itu, dia menjadi membenci Alpha dan mengatakan pada dirinya sendiri bahwa dia tidak membutuhkan teman hidup atau ikatan, tetapi bahkan dengan kejadian itu, dia bersikeras untuk menjaga anak itu dan membesarkannya, dan seorang malaikat bernama Shizuku lahir. Dia menjadi kekuatan dan pusatnya dalam kata kejam yang memperlakukan Omega secara tidak adil. Namun hidupnya tiba-tiba berubah ketika dia bertemu dengan seorang Alpha bernama Hazuki Tsuchiya dari pesta perjodohan yang dia paksa untuk hadiri.

---
[Official Korean Translation (한국어)](https://www.bomtoon.com/comic/ep_list/let_hate)
description.it:
Nell'universo alternativo detto omegaverse gli uomini e le donne si dividono in alpha, beta e omega, e anche i maschi possono portare avanti una gravidanza. Naoto Koga è un omega e al liceo è stato vittima di violenza sessuale da parte di un gruppo di alpha. Quando scopre di aspettare un bambino decide di portare al termine la gestazione, e dà alla luce una dolcissima femminuccia che chiama Shizuku e ama con tutto stesso. Tuttavia, la sua esperienza traumatica e le sofferenze dovute al fatto di essere un omega non possono fare a meno che portarlo a odiare gli alpha e a convincersi di non avere bisogno di nessun compagno. Le cose cominciano però a cambiare quando incontra Hazuki Tsuchiya. Forse non tutti gli alpha sono uguali…

---
[Official Korean Translation (한국어)](https://www.bomtoon.com/comic/ep_list/let_hate)
description.ja:
「しずくは俺が守るんだ、αなんていらない」
Ωの雫斗は一人娘のしずくと暮らすシングルマザー。
娘を愛する雫斗だが、αに対するトラウマは根深く、
番は作らないと決めていた。
しかし、むりやり参加させられた婚活パーティーで雫斗を「運命の番」だと言うαが現れる。
その場は逃げ帰ったものの、後日新しい勤め先で学校制服姿の件のα・葉月と出くわして!?
描き下ろしはその後のラブラブ孕ませエッチ

---
[Official Korean Translation (한국어)](https://www.bomtoon.com/comic/ep_list/let_hate)
description.th:
“ฉันจะปกป้องชิซุคุเอง ฉันไม่ต้องการอัลฟ่า”
นาโอโตะผู้เป็นโอเมก้าเป็นแม่เลี้ยงเดี่ยวอาศัยอยู่กับชิซุคุ ลูกสาวคนเดียวของเขา นาโอโตะที่รักลูกสาวมากนั้นมีแผลลึกในใจเกี่ยวกับอัลฟ่าจึงตัดสินใจว่าจะไม่มีคู่
แต่มีอัลฟ่าคนหนึ่งบอกว่านาโอโตะเป็น “คู่แห่งโชคชะตา” ปรากฏตัวขึ้นในงานเลี้ยงจับคู่ที่ถูกบังคับให้ไป
ถึงจะหนีออกมาจากที่นั่น แต่กลับได้พบกับฮาซึกิ อัลฟ่าคนนั้นในชุดนักเรียนในที่ทำงานใหม่!?
บทส่งท้ายมีฉากลามกสุดหวานหลังจากเรื่องราวทั้งหมดด้วยนะ

---
[Official Korean Translation (한국어)](https://www.bomtoon.com/comic/ep_list/let_hate)
description.uk:
Кога Наото - омега, якого зґвалтували однокласники альфи, через що він завагітнів. Через цей травматичний досвід, він зненавидів альф, та відмовляв собі в допомозі з їх сторони, але незважаючи на це, все одно народив дитину від одного з насильників. Шизуку стала його опорою та сенсом життя у цьому жорсткому світі. Але його життя раптово змінилось, коли він зустрів альфу - Цучію Хазукі.

---
[Official Korean Translation (한국어)](https://www.bomtoon.com/comic/ep_list/let_hate)

altTitles.ja: 霧尾ファンクラブ

description.en: Aimi Miyoshi and Nami Sometani are two high school girls who often find themselves talking about a boy in their class, Kirio. This lighthearted romantic comedy follows the daily lives of these two friends and rivals on a journey that, for now, seems to be heading everywhere but love.
description.ja:
女子高生・三好藍美（みよしあいみ）と染谷波（そめたになみ）。二人の間で話題にのぼるのは、いつだって同じクラスの「霧尾（きりお）くん」のこと。
友人でありライバルでもある二人の日常を描く、ラブまではまだたどり着けそうにない一方通行ラブコメディー。

altTitles.ja: 銃夢火星戦記

description.en: Third part of the Gunnm series after GUNNM and GUNNM Last Order.

altTitles.ru: Приди же в Мир Демонов, Ирума-кун!

altTitles.th: อิรุมะคุงกับโรงเรียนปิศาจ

altTitles.ja: 魔入りました！入間くん

altTitles.vi: Iruma Giá Đáo

altTitles.id: Selamat datang di sekolah iblis! Iruma-kun

description.en: Hopeless pushover Iruma Suzuki has found himself in a devil of a predicament… His trashy parents have sold off his soul, and he now has to live and attend school in the Netherworld. But with his unique survival skills and doting demon grandfather’s support, Iruma will surely make it through this hellish experience. He’ll just need to subjugate rival classmates, summon familiars, and more, all while never revealing that he’s human… Easy as *aleph, bet, gimel*, right?
description.es:
Con una vida bastante desgraciada y unos padres vagos y avaros, Iruma es arrastrado al infierno contra su voluntad después de que estos lo vendan a un demonio. Pero para su sorpresa, la vida que le depara el inframundo es mucho mejor que la que tenía con su familia.

Bajo la tutela de su nuevo dueño, un poderoso, pero solitario demonio que sólo quería cumplir su anhelo de tener un nieto, empieza a asistir a un instituto del que este es director después de firmar cierto contrato con él.

Ahora, Iruma tiene que intentar adaptarse al mundo de los demonios mientras esconde su naturaleza humana y se enfrenta a los distintos desafíos que lo esperan en su nuevo instituto. ¡Su nueva vida demoníaca acaba de empezar!
description.ru: Четырнадцатилетний Судзуки Ирума только что был брошен и продан демону его безответственными родителями! Тем не менее, к своему удивлению, он оказывается теперь живет с демоном, как его приёмный внук. Затем он поступил в школу, где его дед — Салливан, работает в качестве директора. Так начинается необычайная школьная жизнь Ирумы-куна среди потусторонних, встречая много красочных лиц, принимая на себя сложные задачи, и сталкиваясь со своим истинным — я, когда он поднимается, чтобы стать кем-то великим. Уютная волшебная повседневность с случайным городским терроризмом.
description.tr: On dört yaşındaki Iruma Suzuki hiçbir isteğe hayır diyemez. Sorumsuz ailesi, onları geçinmek için onu tehlikeli işlerden tehlikeli işlere koşturtur ve sonra bir gün onu bir iblise satarlar! Ancak iblis, Iruma'yı torunu olarak evlat edinmek isteyince çok şaşırır. Bu isteği reddedemeyen Iruma, büyük iblis Sullivan'ın torunu olur. Yeni sevecen iblis dedesi onu, Sullivan'ın tesadüfen müdürü olduğu İblis Okulu Babyls'e kaydettirir. Böylece Iruma-kun'un diğer dünyadakiler arasındaki sıra dışı okul hayatı başlar; birçok renkli iblisle tanışır, zorlu mücadelelere atılır ve büyük biri olmak için yükselirken gerçek benliğiyle yüzleşir.
description.vi: Mairimashita! Iruma-kun là câu chuyện kể về cậu bé Suzuki Iruma, người đã bị bố mẹ mình kí khế ước bán cho ác ma để đổi lấy tiền tài và bình an. Cậu bé Iruma đáng thương từ lúc mới biết đi (1 tuổi) đã phải "ra xã hội" lăn lộn, buôn ba khắp nơi với hai vị phụ huynh "tưng tửng" cho đến ngày một Ác Ma đến rước cậu đến Ma giới theo khế ước. Tưởng chừng như sắp vào bụng quỷ thì vị Ác Ma già nua này đã khóc lóc yêu cầu cậu làm cháu trai ông ta, với bản tính lương thiện và tốt bụng đến cả bản thân mình cũng phải kinh ngạc, cậu bất đắc dĩ đã đồng ý lời đề nghị đó và nhập học trường Ác Ma theo ý ông ta. Chuyện gì sẽ xảy ra tiếp theo, mời các bạn theo dõi cuộc sống học đường đầy bất thường của Iruma-kun.
description.pt-br:
Iruma Suzuki, de quatorze anos, não pode dizer não a nenhum pedido. Seus pais irresponsáveis ​​o fazem trabalhar em empregos perigosos para sustentá-los, e então um dia eles o vendem para um demônio! Mas, para sua surpresa, o demônio quer adotar Iruma como seu neto?  

Incapaz de recusar seu pedido, Iruma torna-se neto do grande demônio Sullivan. Seu novo avô demônio amoroso o matricula na Demon School Babyls - onde Sullivan é coincidentemente o diretor. Assim começa a extraordinária vida escolar de Iruma-kun entre o outro mundo, encontrando muitos demônios coloridos, enfrentando desafios assustadores e enfrentando seu verdadeiro eu enquanto ele se torna alguém grande.

[ 1° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 7, Cap 44. ]
[ 2° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 11, Cap 94. ]
[ 3° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 17, metade do Cap 147.]

altTitles.vi: Lời Mời Gọi Phóng Đãng Của Nữ Công Tước

altTitles.ja: 淫乱な公爵夫人からの招待状

description.en:
Unable to endure the greedy and unscrupulous people from his wife's family, Archduke Arthur Percy demands a divorce from his wife, Roxanne.  
  
Knowing fully well that as soon as she gets divorce her family will sell her out to another man, the Duchess offers a bold proposal.  
  
She asks permission to have an affair with another man before the divorce, so she could finally enjoy a short period of freedom and finally knows what it's like to be cherished by someone.  
  
Roxanne then meets a kind gentle with a mask that seems to fulfill all of her desires and that feels strangely familiar.

altTitles.ja: 死して生きるSSS級ハンター

altTitles.th: นักล่าพลีชีพ ระดับ SSS

description.de:
In dem mysteriösen, einem RPG Dungeon ähnelnden Turm lebt der alle berühmten Hunter beneidende Gong-Ja Kim sein alltägliches Leben.
Eines Tages wird sein Wunsch nach mehr mit einem legendären Skill beantwortet, mit dem er die Fähigkeiten anderer kopieren kann ... auf Kosten seines eigenen Lebens.
Bevor er einen Sinn daraus ziehen kann, wird er vom Rang 1 Hunter, dem Flame Emperor, ermordet!
Das aktiviert aber seinen Skill und nun besitzt er einen neuen, nämlich die Möglichkeit, durch seinen Tod in der Zeit zurückzureisen.
Wie wird Gong-Ja dieses Skills nutzen, um seine Konkurrenz zu überflügeln und die Spitze zu erreichen?
description.en:
In the mysterious, RPG dungeon-like Tower, Gongja Kim lives a mundane existence, envying all the star hunters. One day, his wish for more is granted with a legendary skill to copy others’ abilities… at the cost of his life. Before he can make sense of it, he’s killed by the #1 hunter, the Flame Emperor! But this activates his skill and now he’s copied a new one, the ability to travel back in time upon death.

How will Gongja use these skills to outplay the competition and rise to the top?
description.id:
Sebuah menara tiba-tiba muncul di dunia. Dari sisi mana pun di bumi, menara tersebut tetap terlihat menembus horizon. Berbagai monster memenuhi tiap lantai yang ada di menara itu. Orang yang masuk dalam menara itu ternyata bisa mendapatkan skill! Semua orang akhirnya berbondong-bondong untuk memburu para monster dan menjadi hunter kelas dunia.

"Tapi aku hanya hunter kelas F yang tidak punya skill apa-apa, aku juga mau skill kelas S! Tunggu..."

CRING!

"Itu... Kartu emas? Akhirnya kemunculan skill-ku datang juga?"

[Skill Level S+]
[BISA MENDUPLIKASI SKILL ORANG YANG MEMBUNUHMU, HANYA TERAKTIVASI KETIKA KAMU MATI]

"Skill ini... Apa gunanya skill semacam ini?!"

---
- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/SSS-Class-Revival-Hunter/46)
description.ja:
Fランクのおちこぼれハンター「孔子」 ランキング１位の「炎帝」を妬む日々を過ごしていた孔子は、ある日「敵のスキルをコピーできる」というS級スキルを手に入れる。 しかし喜びも束の間、このスキル…何かがおかしい！！ なに！？発動条件がオレの死…？最高のハンターを目指す孔子の挑戦が始まる…！

---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/65543)
description.ko:
F급 말단 헌터 ‘김공자‘.
랭킹 1위 ‘염제‘를 부러워하던 어느 날, 무려 S+급 스킬을 얻는다.
하지만 기쁨도 잠시, 어째 스킬 내용이 이상하다?!
 
상대의 스킬 중 1개를 복사한다,까지는 좋은데…
 
"뭐? 내가 죽어야만 발동된다고?!"
 
죽어야 사는 헌터의 인간찬가 <SSS급 죽어야 사는 헌터>

---

description.th:
เป็นตอนที่ทำให้เสียน้ำตาแบบมากๆตั้งแต่พาเนลที่พระเอกเดินเข้ามาในบ้านยันตอนสุดท้ายที่ปลอบโยนดวงวิญญาณ ไม่ใช่การกำจัดบอสเพราะต้อง"กำจัด"เพียงอย่างเดียว แต่พระเอกตกตระกอนความคิดตอนเห็นเรื่องราวในอดีตได้เลยเลือกที่จะกำจัดโดยใช้วิธีปลอบโยนแทน มันแบบ อือ เหมียนหมา

---

description.pt-br:
Eu também quero uma habilidade Rank S! Eu quero tanto que eu poderia morrer por isso!

[Você despertou uma habilidade Rank S.] [Mas só funciona quando você morre.]
Eh !? DO QUE ELA VAI SERVIR SE EU JÁ ESTIVER MORTO!?
description.zh-hk:
身處F級底層的獵人「金孔子」
長久以來一直羨慕著排行第一的獵人「炎帝」。
某天，他竟突然獲得了S+級的技能。
不料，短暫開心過後，
他發現這個技能有些古怪?!

「複製對方的其中一種技能」
到這裡都還不錯...

「什麼?竟然要我死了才能發動?!」

重生獵人的人生樂章——
《SSS級死而復生的獵人》

---

altTitles.ja: Dorei Shounin Shika Sentakushi Ga Nai desu Yo? ~Harem? Nani sore oishii no?~

altTitles.en: Is The Only Option a Slave Merchant? ~ Harem? What is that, Is it tasty? ~

altTitles.ja: 奴隷商人しか選択肢がないですよ?～ハーレム?なにそれおいしいの?～

description.en:
Zeolith wanted a chill life, but when he turned 15 his villages rule was that they had to go to the vocational school "Velciel" where each student will choose their profession. Zeolith wanted an easy job where he could laze around all day, but the only options he got were : "The Highest Peak of the Human Race【Hero】", "The Strongest Ruler 【Demon Emperor】", "The Title of the Strongest Magician 【Great Sage】", "And the last one "The Lowest Title, a Job For Scum【Slave Merchant】". 

None of the titles were a good option. He picked the lowest title 【Slave Merchant】, which is inconspicuous among them and seems to be easy to live. But, He doesn't know it yet. 

It's the lowest occupation but it is the strongest for him and the most annoying-tiring ones. A harem struggle to be swayed by a variety of women, slutty alluring girls from elderly to younger ones who are his childhood friend's, the poisonous plantgirl, elves, cat ears adventurer, Loli Demon Lord, et cetera.  
  
This is Tale of The strongest【Slave Merchant】unwillingly makes a big success!
description.id:
Zeoris menginginkan kehidupan yang santai, tetapi ketika dia berusia 15 tahun, aturan desanya adalah bahwa mereka harus pergi ke sekolah keahlian “Velciel” di mana setiap siswa akan memilih profesi mereka. Zeoris menginginkan pekerjaan yang mudah di mana dia bisa bermalas-malasan sepanjang hari, tetapi satu-satunya pilihan yang dia dapatkan adalah: “Puncak Tertinggi dari Ras Manusia 【HERO】”, “Penguasa Terkuat 【Demon Emperor】”, “Gelar yang Terkuat Penyihir 【Great Sage】 “,” Dan yang terakhir “Tittle Terendah, Pekerjaan Untuk Sampah 【Slave Merchant】”. Tidak ada gelar yang merupakan pilihan bagus. Dia memilih gelar terendah 【Slave Merchant】, yang tidak mencolok di antara mereka dan tampaknya mudah untuk hidup.  
  
Tapi, dia belum mengetahuinya. Itu adalah pekerjaan paling rendah tetapi itu yang terkuat baginya dan yang paling melelahkan. Perjuangan harem untuk diombang-ambingkan oleh berbagai wanita, gadis cantik yang memikat dari tua hingga yang lebih muda yang merupakan teman masa kecilnya, gadis tumbuhan beracun, elf, petualang telinga kucing, Loli Demon Lord, dan lain-lain.  
  
Ini adalah Dongeng Terkuat 【Slave Merchant】 yang enggan membuat sukses besar!

title.en: Kill the Male Lead to Become the Villainess

altTitles.zh: 杀死男主然后成为女魔头

altTitles.ru: Убить главного героя, чтобы стать злодейкой

altTitles.en: Kill the Male Lead to Become the Demoness

altTitles.vi: Giết Chết Nam Chính, Ta Trở Thành Nữ Ma Đầu.

description.en:
After killing the male lead, the originally innocent girl transformed into a villainess.
Just as she was about to enjoy her newfound freedom, she died a violent death and returned back to the start of the game.
Having carried over with her all the skills she acquired in her previous "playthrough", she was prepared to kill the male lead again; however, the current circumstances seem a bit... strange?
description.ru:
Убив главного героя, девушка становится монстром в глазах других, но, собираясь насладиться свободой, трагично погибает и оказывается в начале игры. Сохранив знания и навыки из прошлой жизни, она собирается повторить своё убийство, однако происходящее кажется немного… странным.
«Да кто же ты такой?!»
description.zh: 杀死男主角后，原小白花女二黑化成了女魔头，正当她快意江湖的时候却暴毙回到游戏的开头。继承了上周目所有能力的她准备先下手为强再次杀死男主，只是现在的情况好像有点……意外？ “不对，你到底谁啊——？！”

description.en: Jiang He, a girl from the Tang Dynasty, traveled through a thousand years and appeared in front of Xu Qing. Fate brought together this love that spanned a thousand years. Everything the girl was familiar with has become history. Relatives, friends, and enemies have all been left behind 1,200 years ago. The boy is unreserved and leads the girl to start a new life. Pain, confusion, cheers, and laughter will remain in this new world.

title.en: I Get Stronger the More I Eat

altTitles.en: I grow stronger, devouring everything in my path

altTitles.ru: Я становлюсь сильнее, пожирая всё на своём пути

description.en:
Known as “Pet Shop,” Mr. Kim has the unique ability to absorb the skills of the creatures he eats. One day, Pet Shop is mysteriously transported to a magical world full of orcs, trolls, and monsters. A new world, new chow, and new skills. Now Pet Shop is determined to become the most powerful creature in the world. Follow his epic climb to the top of the food chain.

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc30674)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.delitoon.com/webtoon/appetit-feroce)
description.fr:
Les armes à feu du monde humain pouvaient arrêter notre héros, plus rien ne peut l’arrêter dans ce nouvel univers ! Réincarné dans une époque imaginaire, celui qu’on surnomme « L’animalerie » doit manger des animaux pour obtenir leurs aptitudes. Pour devenir plus fort, il doit allier quantité et qualité. Sa vie ressemble à un jeu vidéo où il faut gagner des compétences et il connaît les règles par cœur !

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc30674)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.delitoon.com/webtoon/appetit-feroce)
description.id:
Setiap orang memiliki bakatnya masing-masing.

Dan bakat yang saya miliki adalah ‘makan’.

Bakat yang bersinar jauh lebih terang di dunia tempat tinggal organisme kuat yang tak terhitung jumlahnya.

Feast Devour.

Konsumsi darah dan daging yang kuat dan jadikan itu milik Anda.

Biarpun itu naga, raja iblis, atau dewa!
description.ko:
사람은 누구나 자신만의 재능을 가지고 있다. 그리고 그가 가진 재능은 바로 '먹는 것'이었다. 세계 곳곳을 돌아다니던 한국 출신의 국제범죄자 킴. 각종 범죄를 저지르던 킴은 국제경찰에 붙잡혀 호송되던 중 알 수 없는 세계에 빨려 들어간다. 그 세계에는 몬스터라 불리는 존재들이 가득했고, 그곳에서 킴은 모든 것을 먹어 치우며 최강의 생물을 꿈꾸게 된다. 나는 무엇이든 먹어 치울 것이다. 설령 그것이 드래곤이라 해도, 마왕이라 해도, 신이라 해도! 그리고 나는... 먹을수록 강해진다. <먹을수록 강해짐>

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc30674)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.delitoon.com/webtoon/appetit-feroce)
description.ru:
«У каждого есть талант. Мой талант — есть».
Ким, международный преступник из Кореи, который скитался по миру и совершивший различные преступления, был пойман международной полицией и затянут в неизвестный мир.

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc30674)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.delitoon.com/webtoon/appetit-feroce)
description.zh:
每个人都有自己专属的才能，李先生拥有的技能便是“吃”！捕猎经历丰富，在世界各地逃亡的的李被国际警察抓捕归案，护送途中掉入了一个未知的世界。这个世界充满了各种怪物。在这里，李吃掉各种生物，梦想成为这个世界的最强者。“我将吃掉所有东西，无论它是龙，是魔王，还是神！而我，越吃越强！”

altTitles.ja: 孤児院テイマー

description.ar:
بعد أن أعيد إحيائه في عالم آخر لموته بسبب كبر العمر، بطل قصتنا "شو" يعيش الآن في ميتم فقير، فيقرر المغامرة كل يوم لأجل مساعدة الميتم، ولتوفير الأكل لأخته وأصدقائه، بالإستعانة بالمهارات التي اكتسبها .  
والآن يعيش حياة عادية هو والبقية ووحوشه الظريفة.
description.en:
Shu, who died of old age, reincarnated as a baby in a different world where he was picked up by a poor orphanage. He quickly grows up under the watchful eye of the gentle director and staff. With skills received from God, he starts to exert talent…
He now lives at his own pace, adventuring with cute monsters and good friends ♪

[web novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n5081ed/) (jp)

altTitles.ja: 天国大魔境

altTitles.vi: Ảo ảnh thiên đường

description.en: Some children live in a comfortably numb world, surrounded by walls. However, one day, a kid named Tokio receives a message asking "Do you want to go outside of the outside?"    Now, from the Heaven that is starting to crumble, the children begin their adventure!
description.fa:
دنیایی پوچ که بچه‌ها در آن با رفاه کامل همراه با دیوارهایی که درون و بیرون را جدا می‌کنند، زندگی می‌کنند اما همه‌ی این‌ها زمانی تغییر می‌کند که یکی از بچه‌ها به نام تاکیو‌ پیامی با این متن دریافت می‌کند: «می‌خوای به خارج از چیزی که اون بیرونه بری؟»

حال از بهشتی که درحال نابودی است بچه‌ها ماجراجویی خود را آغاز می‌کنند.
description.fr: Dans un immense jardin coupé du monde, un groupe d'enfants jouit d'une vie douce et d'insouciance, protégé par des scientifiques. Le monde extérieur leur est inconnu mais certains d'entre eux se questionnent : qu'y a-t-il au-delà des murs de leur paradis ?Pendant ce temps, dans un Japon dévasté par un mystérieux cataclysme, Maru et Kiruko, deux adolescents de la génération post-catastrophe, tentent de survivre dans un monde désolé peuplé de pillards et de monstres difformes. Leur objectif : atteindre "le Paradis".
description.ja: 美しい壁に囲まれた世界で暮らす子供たち。少年・トキオはある日、「外の外に行きたいですか？」というメッセージを受け取る。一方、外では、マルとおねえちゃんがサバイバル生活をしながら、天国を求めて、魔境となった世界を旅している。未来の日本を「あね散歩」。
description.pt: Em um mundo pós-apocalíptico, dois jovens: Maru um garoto amigável e que esconde vários segredos; E Kiruko, uma garota impetuosa e protetora. Juntos eles vagam pelo cenário desolado em busca de um chamado "paraíso". Enquanto isso, em um outro lugar isolado do resto do mundo, vivem várias crianças sem saber do que acontece no exterior. Como essas duas histórias vão se conectar?
description.ru:
Две истории, которые непременно связаны…

Таинственный Мару — мальчик, у которого есть одна цель: найти «Рай»! На пути к ним он обрёл телохранителя — Кируко. Она тоже не так уж проста, как может показаться на первый взгляд. В этом путешествии к «Небесам» они вместе посетят много мест ушедшей эпохи и встретят разных врагов!

Токио — девочка, которая живёт за великими стенами «Небес»! Это место можно назвать раем. Вокруг высокие деревья, зеленая трава, плантации свежих овощей и даже есть небольшой водоем! Вместе с Токио здесь можно встретить и других детей, каждый из которых обладает своим особенным даром. В один из дней Токио получает сообщение: «Ты хочешь выбраться отсюда?» Кажется, с этого момента что-то странное начинает твориться в пределах «Небес»…
description.pt-br: Em um mundo pós-apocalíptico, dois jovens: Maru um garoto amigável e que esconde vários segredos; E Kiruko, uma garota impetuosa e protetora. Juntos eles vagam pelo cenário desolado em busca de um chamado "paraíso". Enquanto isso, em um outro lugar isolado do resto do mundo, vivem várias crianças sem saber do que acontece no exterior. Como essas duas histórias vão se conectar?

altTitles.ja: トランプ

description.en:
Sophie, a boy with vampire and human blood, is transferred from an orphanage to an institution called Clan. The school houses vampire boys who have reached their Cocoon period, or puberty in human terms. Sophie has a fateful encounter with a boy named Ul while being coldly greeted by the vampires around him. As Ul continues to research the “power of immortality” that vampires once possessed, he learns of the existence of TRUMP, the original vampire that is said to live forever, and begins to crave eternal life.

Eventually, Sophie and Ul become entangled in the deep fate surrounding the legend of immortality...

A manga adaptation of the origin story of playwright Kenichi Suemitsu’s popular series! A Gothic school fantasy that beautifully spins the conflicts of impressionable and sensitive boysー!
description.ja: 吸血種<ヴァンプ>と人間の血が流れる少年ソフィは、養護院からクランと呼ばれる施設へと入所した。そこは繭期――人間でいうところの思春期を迎えた吸血種の少年たちが集う学園。周囲の吸血種から冷ややかな目で迎えられる中、ソフィはある一人の少年と運命的な出会いを果たす。劇作家・末満健一の人気シリーズの原点となる物語をコミック化!! 繊細かつ多感な少年たちの葛藤を美しく紡ぎ出すゴシック学園ファンタジー!
description.vi: Câu chuyện xoay quanh Sophie Anderson - một con lai giữa con người và ma cà rồng (Dhampir), bị khinh ghét vì sự không thuần khiết. Tuy vậy, Sophie vẫn vượt lên những trở ngại với trái tim cao quý và luôn đầy tự hào về dòng máu của mình.

description.en: Countess Nicole's fiancé, Chaos, is always by his childhood friend, Princess Caroline's side. As a result of being constantly neglected by Chaos, Nicole has awakened to the idea of ​​being alone, thinking, "If that's what he likes, then I should do what I like too!"...? While Nicole has discovered the ease of being alone, Chaos, on the other hand, doesn't seem to understand the seriousness of the situation...? The long-awaited comic adaptation of the slapstick love comedy of Chaos and Nicole, whose mutual unrequited love has become complicated!

The Many Sides of Voice Actor Radio

description.en: Yugure Yuhi and Utatane Yasumi, two high schooler voice actresses who just happened to attend the same school and coincidentally got placed into the same class, are the two hosts of a radio weekly program. As fellow classmates and voice actresses, they show all the listeners their great friendship! At least, on the surface. In reality, the quiet girl Chika and the gyaru Yumiko are complete opposites. And they absolutely cannot stand each other. Off air, chaos and insults erupt. On air, they're the best of friends. Just where will this tumultuous relationship lead them?

The people of the Jellies are under the blow of a terrible curse: the overheated libido of king Gélax forced him to copulate all the holy day! Alas, this frenzied reproduction jeopardizes the balance of Amakna which risks collapsing under frozen babies! ! Arty, a young shepherd from the region, is convinced that this curse is linked to the kidnapping of his grandfather, the dreaded and dreaded Crail.

description.en:
*A spin-off of the YuruYuri series featuring the Oomuro family of sisters!*

From oldest to youngest, there's **Nadeshiko**, the cool and serious high schooler; **Sakurako**, the silly, lazy, and (slightly) dimwitted middle schooler; and **Hanako**, the intelligent and mature elementary schooler! 

This story focuses on these three sisters, their friends. and the many fun and wild adventures they have together!
